events.text: everyone says they want to die in their sleep, but it’s not so great.
i curled up at the foot of his bed that night, not knowing i wouldn’t wake up in that world.
or did i know? was i supposed to feel something before i went to bed? was i supposed to know i was going to die?
it didn’t even feel different from sleeping.
i’m glad i didn’t have to see how he reacted when he woke up. i was already here by then.
it was time well spent, though. always.
i’m ready to not be here anymore.
